ComicInfo.Summary:
New writers and a whole lot of nasty comes your way as Vertigo unleashes another anthology of war-terror, that is, the second issue of Weird War Tales. This issue contains the following stories:
"The Elopment" is about a prisoner of war's encounter with a woman disguising as a man, who plots to escape their incarceration and the man's struggle to return to the woman after she was murdered in a prison riot.
"Mightier" is a wordless presentation which shows a simple signing of the man in power, which is the unnamed President of the United States in this story, means the death of several innocents in a split second. And...
"Looking Good, Feeling Great" is about a wannabe soldier boy who goes on a bloody killing spree against those who ever underestimated him after being rejected several times by the army.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-09-19 12:50:05. [CVDB52665]
